did.unittitle: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR) 25th Anniversary Memorabilia, 1970

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations

did.abstract: Bottles of sherry with special labels, in celebration of the 25th anniversary of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.

defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: /3015: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR) 25th Anniversary File. /4036 AV: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR) After Dinner Comments at 25th Anniversary Dinner in New York City, December 11, 1970

controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Great Western Solera, New York State Sherry, Pleasant Valley Wine Co. -- each with special labels -- Cornell University, 25th Anniversary Celebration and Dinner, New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations, November 7, 1970, Statler Club -- only one bottle has Sherry in it and that was removed from stacks and placed in the Library Director's office until the schools 75th Anniversary
